contactCta.title: Tell us your use case
contactCta.subtitle: Share what you want to build and we will help you shape the right solution.

responsible.title: Responsible AI, by design
responsible.subtitle: We show our work with clear standards, visible safeguards, and honest answers when people ask how your AI behaves.

principles.title: Safe by default
principles.body: We engineer oversight, monitoring, and fail-safes so agents behave predictably in real-world workflows.

principles.title: Privacy-respecting
principles.body: Your data stays yours. We minimize collection, encrypt in transit, and keep access auditable.

principles.title: Sustainable
principles.body: We optimize models and infrastructure to cut compute waste without sacrificing quality.

jobs.heroTitle: Build the future of AI, with us
jobs.heroSubtitle: We are a small team moving fast on ambitious problems. If you care about performance, ownership, and shipping real systems, you will love it here.
jobs.status: We are moving fast. If a role clicks with you, just reach out.

stack.title: Our stack
stack.subtitle: Tools we build with every day, chosen for speed, reliability, and shipping real systems.

roles.title: Systems Maker
roles.summary: Build fast, reliable backend systems for our local AI models and client deployments. Own core infrastructure and ship performance-first services.
responsibilities: Design high-throughput services for AI workloads.
Own APIs from schema to production reliability.
Make systems observable: metrics, logs, tracing.
requirements: Strong backend experience in microservice architectures.
Proficiency in TypeScript/Node, Go, Rust, C#, or Python.
Experience with modern databases (Postgres, Mongo, Qdrant, ClickHouse).
Solid Docker + Kubernetes know-how.
Performance- and reliability-focused mindset.

roles.title: Agent Runtime Architect
roles.summary: Own the runtime that powers our agents. Define the platform and ship systems that keep workflows fast and safe.
responsibilities: Build agent execution runtimes with strong isolation and observability.
Implement scheduling, retries, and guardrails for long-running tasks.
Ship performance improvements across orchestration and memory layers.
requirements: Experience building distributed systems or orchestration platforms.
Strong TypeScript/Node, Go, or Rust background.
Familiarity with event-driven systems, queues, or pub/sub.
Comfort with profiling, benchmarking, and performance tuning.
Security-first mindset around data access and isolation.

roles.title: Model Performance Lead
roles.summary: Ship model improvements that matter in production. Own experiments end-to-end and push them into client workflows.
responsibilities: Run experiments on fine-tuning, retrieval, and evaluation.
Build tooling for model benchmarking and regression testing.
Optimize inference performance and memory usage.
requirements: Hands-on experience with LLMs and modern ML toolchains.
Strong Python skills and familiarity with PyTorch or JAX.
Experience with evaluation frameworks and dataset curation.
Comfort deploying models to production environments.
Clear communication of experimental results and trade-offs.

roles.title: ML Apprentice
roles.summary: Work alongside senior engineers on model tuning, data pipelines, and deployments. Grow into full-stack ML work.
responsibilities: Assist with dataset preparation, evaluation, and analysis.
Implement experiments and track results in a reproducible way.
Help ship model updates and monitor quality in production.
requirements: Solid Python fundamentals and basic ML knowledge.
Familiarity with Git and reproducible workflows.
Curiosity and ability to learn fast.
Clear communication and ownership of tasks.

roles.title: Product Interface Maker
roles.summary: Craft fast, elegant frontends for our AI products. Own UI features end-to-end and ship polished experiences.
responsibilities: Build responsive UI components with React and Next.js.
Ship production-ready interfaces with Tailwind CSS.
Own frontend performance, accessibility, and UX polish.
requirements: Strong React and TypeScript fundamentals.
Experience with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
Good eye for UX and visual quality.
Comfort owning ambiguous problems end-to-end.

footer.title: Not seeing your role?
footer.body: We are always looking for exceptional engineers. Send a short intro and what you want to build with us.

research.title: Research
research.subtitle: Pushing the frontier
research.desc: We explore novel architectures, improve reasoning, and optimize inference. Applied research that ships to production.

agentic.title: Agents
agentic.subtitle: AI that executes
agentic.desc: Autonomous systems that don't just respond - they act. Built for complex workflows, tool use, and real-world decision making.

solutions.title: Integration
solutions.subtitle: AI for your stack
solutions.desc: We plug intelligence into existing systems. Your data, your infrastructure, our models. Production-ready from day one.

diagram.subtitle: How It Works
diagram.title: AI Agent at the Core
diagram.description: One intelligent hub that connects your data sources to your business systems. Automate workflows, sync data, and make decisions in real-time. It quietly takes repetitive work off your plate so your team stays focused.

models.title: Our Models
models.subtitle: Fine-tuned for performance
models.description: Optimized in-house for speed and reliability. No wrappers, no external APIs - just fast inference tuned for real-world workloads.

nano.name: Nano
nano.subtitle: Small. Fast. Everywhere.
nano.desc: Optimized for resource-constrained environments. Runs on-device, in-browser, at the edge. Sub-100ms latency, minimal memory footprint. Intelligence without the infrastructure.

flow.name: Flow
flow.subtitle: Less talk. More work.
flow.desc: Purpose-built for autonomous execution. Excels at multi-step reasoning, tool orchestration, and long-horizon tasks. The model that gets things done.

one.name: One
one.subtitle: Maximum capability.
one.desc: Our most powerful model. State-of-the-art reasoning, deep domain expertise, complex problem solving. When the task demands the best, this is it.

footer.tagline: Made with lots of ‚òï and üî• GPUs in Czechia.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy. This policy explains what we collect when you use the Zet Labs website and waitlist form, and how we use that information.

data.title: Information we collect
body: Contact details you provide, such as your email when joining the waitlist.
Basic usage data (page views and interactions) to improve the site.
Essential cookies required for site functionality.

use.title: How we use your information
body: Operate, maintain, and improve the website and waitlist experience.
Respond to inquiries and send waitlist updates.
Protect against abuse and keep the site secure.

sharing.title: Sharing
body: We do not sell your data.
We may share data with trusted service providers who help us run the site.
We may disclose information if required by law.

security.title: Security
body: We use reasonable safeguards to protect your data.
No method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

choices.title: Your choices
body: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
You can opt out of waitlist emails at any time.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using the Zet Labs website, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the site.

use.title: Use of the site
body: Do not misuse the site or attempt unauthorized access.
You must comply with applicable laws when using the site.

ip.title: Intellectual property
body: All content on this site is owned by Zet Labs or its licensors.
You may not copy, modify, or distribute content without permission.

waitlist.title: Waitlist
body: Submitting the waitlist form does not guarantee access.
We may contact you about the product and availability.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers
body: The site is provided on an "as is" basis without warranties.
We do not guarantee the site will be available or error-free.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
body: Zet Labs is not liable for indirect or consequential damages.
Our total liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

law.title: Governing law
body: These terms are governed by the laws of the Czech Republic.

code.result2: JWT rotation enabled; refresh path added.
code.result3: All unit and integration tests passing.

data.result1: Found 3 outliers. Region EU-West, Q2 spike.

supply.prompt: optimize weekly inventory plan for 12 warehouses
supply.thinking: Simulating demand shifts and lead times...
supply.result1: Stockouts reduced by 38% with no extra spend.

finance.prompt: reconcile Q4 cash flow and flag risks
finance.result3: Cash runway confirmed. No action needed.
